body_1.text: Our code covers 14 policy areas. Select at least 3 policy areas to review.

item_body.text:
Legitimate sources include:

  • Private donations
  • Legitimate commercial enterprises
  • Legitimate non-profit or religious organisations


Criminal sources include:

  • Proceeds of criminal activity, such as narcotics, fraud, robbery, kidnapping and extortion.
  • Conflict resources, such as oil, diamonds or minerals.
  • Shell companies or charities.
  • Sponsorship by rogue states.


More recently, groups have been raising income from appeals on social media, or even using crowdfunding sites.
